#summary Cadpage Permissions

= Introduction =

Why do we need the permissions we do ?


= Details =

  * android.permission.READ_SMS
  * android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS
  * android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS
We need the 3 above to read SMS messages to catch and find the dispatched call.

  * android.permission.WAKE_LOCK
  * android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD
  * android.permission.VIBRATE

We need the above 3 so we can show the message in all cases.

  * android.permission.GET_TASKS
  * android.permission.READ_LOGS
  * android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE
We need the above 3 to know if your on the phone or not

  * android.permission.INTERNET
  * android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
  * android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
  * android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
The above 4 are used for Google Maps

  * android.permission.WRITE_SMS (removed in V 1.1.8)
This will be removed soon. Still have some dependent code from smspopup

  * android.permission.READ_CONTACTS
This will be removed soon. Still have some dependent code from smspopup

  * android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
This is so we can add the new ringtone.
